paqc.report package¶

Submodules¶

paqc.report.report module¶

This submodule contains classes that build up, store and handle the report that is generated during the run of the series of tests.

class paqc.report.report.Report(config)¶

Bases: object

Class for building up, storing, ordering and managing the report items of individual tests.

add_item(report_item)¶

Adds a new ReportItem to the Report.

Parameters:report_item – ReportItem
Returns:None.
generate_report()¶

This function simply generates the final report HTML and the JSON that feeds the JavaScript tables. It also saves the tables as csv

Returns:Nothing.
get_report_table()¶

Turns the internal list of ReportItem obj representation of the Report object into a pandas DataFrame.

Returns:pandas DataFrame where each row is a ReportItem.
get_summary_stats()¶

This gathers a few simple summary stats about the Report object. The keys of the returned dict are self-explanatory, so see those.

Returns:Dict, with the following keys: qc_sum, data_file_sum, passed_sum, failed_sum, total_exec_time.
order_items(most_severe_first=True)¶

This method will order the report items based on their severity, where error > warning > info.

Parameters:most_severe_first – If set to False, info items are the first

in the generated report. :return: None. This simply reorders the internal state of the Report.

print_items()¶

Simply prints the Report object’s ReportItems to the terminal.

Returns:Nothing, prints to terminal.
class paqc.report.report.ReportItem(passed, level, order, qc_num, input_file, input_file_path, extra=None, text=None, exec_time=0, qc_params=None, data_hash=None)¶

Bases: object

Simple lass for the output of an individual test. Each item has to have a level, and input file, and a text the holds the info, warning or error message.

classmethod init_conditional(list_failures, dict_config)¶
